means: steerable telemetry antenna receiving equipment 可控遥测天线接收设备

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词都有"看，瞧"之意。
means: gaze ： 指出于羡慕、感兴趣、关心或惊异而长时间目不转睛地看。
glare ： 指用愤恨、凶狠或含敌意的眼光死死看着某人。
stare ： 侧重因惊奇、好奇、粗鲁无礼等而睁大眼睛看。
peer ： 指眯着眼睛仔细地或略为吃力地看。
glance ： 指匆匆地或粗略地一看，侧重心不在焉地、匆忙地看一眼。

word_mean: 凝视，注视：固定地、不眨眼地盯看

sentence.Network_en: With a glazed stare she revived for one last instant.
sentence.Network_cn: 她最后清醒了一会儿，眼神呆滞。

sentence.Network_en: He fixes you with a piercing stare.
sentence.Network_cn: 他用锐利的目光盯住你。

sentence.Network_en: Henry gave Paul a glassy-eyed stare.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 凝字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 凝神定气〖 concentrateone'sattention〗 凝视〖 gazefixedly;stare〗 凝思〖 meditate〗.
求WOW命令大全~_爱问知识人 ... /Stand( 站立) /Stare( 盯视) /Stink( 臭味).
普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... starch 淀粉 stare 注视 stark 僵硬的.
高一英语单词表 - 豆丁网 ... Amy 艾米（女子名） stare vi 凝视；盯着看 stare at 盯着.

list.abs: 新概念英语第三册学习笔记（2） ... look on 旁观, 观看 stare at 凝视, 盯住 hurry off 匆忙离开.
发明是动词，没有反义词啊。_百度知道 ... 发达国家[ developed country] 发呆[ stare blankly] 发电[ generate electric power].
根据遵循先例 (stare decisis) 的原则，普通法继续发展和适用于香港，但当然是受《基本法》、成文法规和本地情况所限制。本席先前 …
遵循先例原则（stare decisis）是判例法制度的一个基本原则，是判例法的基　　础。
直,直字的解释,查字典 ... 直觉性[ here] 直愣愣[ staring blankly] 直立[ erect;straight].

phrase.cizu_name: be staring something in the face

jx.jx_en_mean: be on the verge of defeat, death, or another unpleasant fate
jx.jx_cn_mean: 处于失败（或死亡等坏运气的）边缘

lj.lj_ly: Everton were staring defeat in the face.
lj.lj_ls: 埃弗顿正处于失败的边缘。

phrase.cizu_name: stare someone in the eye (或 face)

jx.jx_en_mean: look fixedly or boldly at someone

lj.lj_ly: the answer had been staring him in the face.
lj.lj_ls: 那答案就曾一直在他的面前。

jx.jx_en_mean: look fixedly at someone until they feel forced to lower their eyes or turn away
jx.jx_cn_mean: 瞪眼 把…看得不敢对视；瞪眼把…看得转过脸去

jx.jx_en_mean: To cause to waver or give in by or as if by staring.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 盯得局促不安：盯视或仿佛盯视而导致动摇或屈服

jx.jx_en_mean: To be plainly visible or obvious; force itself on (one's) attention
jx.jx_cn_mean: 就在眼前：明白可见的或显而易见；物就摆在面前

lj.lj_ly: The money on the table was staring her in the face.
lj.lj_ls: 钱就在桌上，摆在她面前

jx.jx_en_mean: To be obvious though initially overlooked
jx.jx_cn_mean: 明明白白的：虽最初被忽视但显而易见

lj.lj_ly: The explanation had been staring him in the face all along.
lj.lj_ls: 这解释对他来说一直是明明白白的

jx.jx_cn_mean: 面临：紧急的或不可避免的

lj.lj_ly: Bankruptcy now stares us in the face.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English starian, of Germanic origin, from a base meaning 'be rigid'

entry.def: If you stare at someone or something, you look at them for a long time.

example.ex: Tamara stared at him in disbelief, shaking her head...
example.tran: 塔玛拉一边狐疑地盯着他看，一边摇着头。

example.ex: Ben continued to stare out the window...

entry.tran: (局势、解决办法等)非常明显的，明摆在眼前
entry.def: If a situation or the answer to a problem is staring you in the face, it is very obvious, although you may not be immediately aware of it.

example.ex: Then the answer hit me. It had been staring me in the face ever since Lullington.
example.tran: 接着我突然想到了答案。从在路林顿起它就一直摆在我的眼前。

means.word_mean: 1. a fixed look with eyes open wide

sentences.sentence: "The students stared at the teacher with amazement"
"The ancestor in the painting is staring down menacingly"

auth_sentence.content: People do not just gawp and stare at it.
auth_sentence.res_content: People do not just gawp and stare at it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: People do not just gawp and stare at it.

auth_sentence.content: The children stare up at her, completely baffled.
auth_sentence.res_content: The children stare up at her, completely baffled.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The children stare up at her, completely baffled.

auth_sentence.content: To stare at people who aren't bothering anybody?
auth_sentence.res_content: To stare at people who aren't bothering anybody?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To stare at people who aren't bothering anybody?

Sentence.sentence: Several of the employees in the computer department, for example, claim to be developing vision problems from having to stare at a video display terminal for about 7 hours a day.
I think your advice will be helpful to those just staring out in business.

sentences.cn: 他一直在凝视着, 思考着。

sentences.en: The child stared the stranger up and down.
sentences.cn: 那孩子上下打量着这个陌生人。

jushi.chinese: 不要盯着人看,这是不礼貌的!

jushi.english: The child stared the stranger up and down.
jushi.chinese: 那孩子上下打量着这个陌生人。
